category: Herbs that promote the movement of Qi

action.primary: Promotes the flow of Qi, alleviates pain, dissipates Stasis and dredges the channels

indications: Gastric ulcer, duodenal ulcer, chronic gastritis, dysmenorrhea, acute gastroenteritis and abdominal pain caused by blood stasis after delivery
Fracture, traumatic injury, hernia and rheumatic arthritis
